text: There's a beauty to wisdom and experience that cannot be faked. It's impossible to be mature without having lived.
author: Amy Grant

text: Praise or blame has but a momentary effect on the man whose love of beauty in the abstract makes him a severe critic on his own works.
author: John Keats

text: Youth is happy because it has the ability to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
author: Franz Kafka

text: It would be difficult for me not to conclude that the most perfect type of masculine beauty is Satan, as portrayed by Milton.
author: Charles Baudelaire

text: I am little concerned with beauty or perfection. I don't care for the great centuries. All I care about is life, struggle, intensity.
author: Emile Zola
